annotations.description: Here’s how to make the Shark’s Tooth, a rare tiki cocktail that’s easy to make. It uses rum from Barbados and Jamaica, Lime Juice, Pineapple Juice, Simple Sy...
annotations.title: Shark's Tooth - How to Make an Easy Tiki Classic (Don the Beachcomber Recipe)

textContent:
1 oz (30 ml) Barbadian Rum
1 oz (30 ml) Jamaican Rum
0.5 oz (15 ml) Lime Juice
0.5 oz (15 ml) Pineapple Juice
0.5 oz (15 ml) Simple Syrup
1 tsp Maraschino Cherry Syrup (or creme de cassis)
3 oz (90 ml) Crushed Ice
Garnish: Cherry & Pineapple Fronds

Shake until ice is mostly gone or blend all on High for 5 seconds. Pour into mug or old fashioned glass. Add garnish.
Optionally add the Jamaican rum at the end as a float. 

https://youtu.be/U8Alo-H-Np4
title: Sharks Tooth
